name: o2o interactive
overview:
Our mission is to innovate across the entire purchase funnel, connecting the online and offline experience for marketers and consumers.

We unlock value for our partners by:

  1. Uncovering opportunities
  2. Inventing solutions
  3. Creating disruption

UNCOVERING OPPORTUNITIES

We spend a lot of time thinking and discussing Social, Local and Mobile as it applies to the purchase funnel. Ideas can come at anytime but waiting for lightning to strike isn’t a business strategy, so we strive to stay at the forefront of thought leadership and identify opportunities that help our clients stay ahead of the curve. As opportunities arise we …

INVENT SOLUTIONS

that enable our customers to execute their strategy and measure the results. At o2o we employ the lean startup methodology of “build, measure, learn” to bring solutions quickly to market. These solutions may be products or comprehensive offerings that are designed to continuously evolve in order to …

CREATE DISRUPTION

and enable our partners to continue to create value and grow their business. Innovation needs a collection of ingredients to be successful – Vision, culture, capabilities and commitment. This is o2o Interactive.

At o2o we don’t “do projects” in the traditional sense. We prefer to build partnerships with companies around innovative ideas that address opportunities across the entire purchase funnel. We’re always thinking about mobile, local, and social and subscribe to the lean start-up “build-measure-learn” methodology.
